name: Pretty Princess Party
overview: This life simulation game has players decorating a fantasy castle. When the player character finds herself transported to a fantasy kingdom, she discovers that its castle has fallen into disrepair and its princess has been gone for years. To return to her own world, she has to take on the role of the princess and restore the castle to its former glory. The castle has 20 different rooms, and over the course of the game the player is given the chance to redecorate and beautify all of them. Over the course of the game, players can collect a wide variety of furniture from a set of 1300 items; they can also collect a wide variety of fashion items to dress up their player character.
